remarks: The result of the group power operator when the exponent is minus one. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 17-Apr-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
gxneg.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
gxneg.2 $e |- N = ( inv ` G ) $.
gxneg.3 $e |- P = ( ^g ` G ) $.
gxm1 $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( A P -u 1 ) = ( N ` A ) ) $.
